title: Dave Kaval Is Getting Creative With His Red Hot A's
itunes:title: Dave Kaval Is Getting Creative With His Red Hot A's
description:
Have you ever wanted to get face to face with your favorite sports teams chief executive? If you’re an Oakland A's fan this is more realistic than you might think. Jon Stashower, Michael Barr and Mike Lynch sit down with Athletics president Dave Kaval and talked about his aggressive marketing plan, how he plans to keep the team in Oakland and why he schedules "Office Hours" to meet the Athletics fan base face to face. Bloomberg 960 AM in the bay area is Oakland's home for play by play coverage of the entire 2020 A's season.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
